p: Welcome to the comprehensive guide to using Kotlin in your FTC codebase. This guide assumes that you know how to program in Kotlin, but no other FTC programming knowledge is necessary.
To contribute, all you have to do is make a pull request with the changes you would like to make. This is greatly appreciated as this is currently a solo, volunteer project.
Installing Kotlin into your FTC project is very easy and shouldn't take more than a few minutes.
Before installing Kotlin, please make sure you have done the following:
Have the latest version of Android Studio downloaded and installed
Have a repository containing the latest version of the FTC SDK
Make sure the Kotlin Plugin is downloaded in Android Studio
